short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your current ATS with AI. FoveaAI identifies top candidates faster and with less work for better recruiting and hiring.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SUPERCHARGE YOUR ATS WITH FOVEAAI's POWERFUL AI RECRUITING TOOLS

Enhance your recruiting and hiring process with the FoveaAI recruiting assistant and candidate evaluation platform. With just a click on any candidate, you can access easy-to-review insights including:

***Candidate Summary***
Get an overview of the candidate's profile.

***Strengths and Weaknesses***
Understand the candidate's fit for the job.

***Job Fit Rating***
Quickly identify superstars using a sortable 0 to 100 job-fit rating.

***Interview Questions***
Generate expert-level, candidate-specific questions to ask during interviews.

***Branded Reports***
Create professional candidate evaluation reports in seconds.

FoveaAI integrates seamlessly into nearly ATS without complicated setup, confusing technical requirements, or downtime.

Download the browser extension and create a FoveaAI account to supercharge your talent acquisition and hiring today!
